org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services

Class NodeServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services.AbstractService
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services.NodeServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.kernel.services.NodeService, org.fcrepo.kernel.services.Service<org.fcrepo.kernel.models.FedoraResource>

    @Component
public class NodeServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.services.NodeService
    Service for managing access to Fedora 'nodes' (either datastreams or objects, we don't care.)
    Since:
    May 9, 2013
    Author:
    Chris Beer
